description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Freshman English Fall 2018

Syllabus

Instructor: Chingshun J. Sheu 許景順 ([cjsheu@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:cjsheu@ntnu.edu.tw))

Textbook: _Keynote 4_, from 師大書苑

Objectives: Students will improve their English reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills, as well as foster habits of independent study to continue improving outside the classroom. This semester focuses especially on reading and writing.

Grading:        10% Essays

                        20% Final exam

30% Group presentation

                        40% Independent study

Group presentation: Each group will present an oral report, live performance, recorded performance, or interactive activity. It will be either in English or related to English. The length must be under 20 minutes.

Independent study: Students must do 4 of the following, OR 2 and one assigned book report, for proportionate credit. Plagiarism will result in an assignment grade of F.

*   50 entries in a notebook for vocabulary learned inside and outside the classroom; each entry should include an English definition and English example sentence
*   10 visits to the English Self-Learning Classroom (excluding _The Big Bang Theory_, _ER_, and _Five Star Day_)
*   10 hours at the English Chat Room
*   1 report in English: reflections on participating in an English event
*   1 report in English: reflections on reading an English book of suitable difficulty
*   1 report in English: reflections on watching an English film without Chinese subtitles

Assigned book report: Students may choose one of the following books and answer questions posted by the instructor. If no questions have been posted, please notify the instructor. Students may propose a different book to read, including nonfiction, subject to instructor approval.

*   Orson Scott Card, _Ender’s Game_
*   Joshua Ferris, _The Unnamed_
*   Shane Jones, _Light Boxes_
*   Marilynne Robinson, _Housekeeping_
*   Garth Stein, _The Art of Racing in the Rain_
*   John Williams, _Stoner_
